arts.ttl: Roma hope to maintain a strong run against Verona
arts.sum: Roma have scored at home against Verona for 17 consecutive matches, totaling 44 goals. Lorenzo Pellegrini has scored 3 goals against Verona - two wearing the Roma shirt and one with Sassuolo.

arts.ttl: AS Roma vs vs Hellas Verona – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: AS Roma and Hellas Verona go head-to-head in Serie A on Sunday at the Stadio Olimpico in Rome. The hosts will be looking to maintain the momentum that has helped them push towards near the top of the table whilst Verona desperately seek their first league victory of the campaign. arts.ttl: AS Roma vs Hellas Verona – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: AS Roma welcome Hellas Verona to the Stadio Olimpico for a crucial Serie A clash on Sunday. The Giallorossi will be aiming to maintain their top four push after a positive start under new manager Gian Piero Gasperini, while Verona are still in search of their opening win of the season.
